name: build_deploy
description: This repo contains scripts to create a standalone, single machine deployment for testing and evaluation purpopses.

scripts.install_device: n-clean device && git clone https://github.com/HIOTio/device.git && n-copy --source device --destination aggregator "*" && n-copy --source device --destination commander "*" && n-copy --source device --destination broker "*" && n-copy --source device --destination coordinator "*"
scripts.copy_config: n-copy --source device_configs/aggregator/ --destination aggregator/ "config.json" && n-copy --source device_configs/broker/ --destination broker/ "config.json" && n-copy --source device_configs/commander/ --destination commander/ "config.json" && n-copy --source device_configs/coordinator/ --destination coordinator/ "config.json"
scripts.start_demo: npm run install_device && npm run copy_config
